Class Trick

  • java.lang.Object
    • Trick

  • public class Trick
extends java.lang.Object
    The Class Trick.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Trick(Player[] players, int startPos, boolean pointsTrick, boolean heartsBroken)
      Instantiates a new trick with the player playing, the position of the player starting play and whether points are allowed in the trick and if hearts have been broken or not.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Trick

        public Trick(Player[] players,
             int startPos,
             boolean pointsTrick,
             boolean heartsBroken)
        Instantiates a new trick with the player playing, the position of the player starting play and whether points are allowed in the trick and if hearts have been broken or not.
        Parameters:
        players - the players playing
        startPos - the position of the player starting the trick
        pointsTrick - whether points are allowed this trick
        heartsBroken - whether hearts have been broken yet

    • Method Detail

      • playTrick

        public void playTrick()
        Goes through the actions of each player playing a card for the trick. Makes sure that each card is valid to be played. Keeps track of points and who played the highest card.
